attributes.action: Force footballers to take a pay cut during the COVID-19 pandemic.
attributes.background:
The Health Secretary rightly says footballers should take a pay cut after the Premiership teams furlough staff.

The government should force high-earning football players to take a pay cut rather than laying off non-playing staff or placing them on furlough.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
